**UPDATES**

- Fixed new ladders
- Fixed new traps
- Fixed lighting
- Added more decals
- Fixed secret room and button
- Added new way / maked map longer
- Fixed nuke time +30 sec = 60sec
- Added new sounds
- Added details
- Fixed lag (at new way fps: 160)
- Fixed lag (at start fps: 30)
- Added new weapons
- Added secret teleport
- Added new glass
- Added more props
- two escape ways
